item.title: Hiro Tsunoda - Mary Jane
item.description:
Mary Jane on my mind
I cry my eyes out
Over you long long
and a lonely night
Ever since you’re gone
Mary Jane on my mind
My one and only love
wondering if
You were still mine oh
how I miss you my dear
Mary Jane on my mind
gently in my dreams
Caress your hair
please remember
I’ll wait forever
I love you-

Mary Jane
on my mind
I cry my eyes out
over you
Long long and
a lonely night
Ever since you’re gone
Mary Jane on my mind
My one and only love
every little thing
You used to do
makes my heart to cry
Mary Jane on my mind
gently in my dreams
Caress your hair
please remember
I’ll wait forever
I love you-
